meanings.sent1: She rethought her decision to go to the party after hearing about the bad weather.
meanings.sent2: He always rethought his answers before submitting his test.
meanings.sent3: After burning the cookies, she rethought her baking skills.
meanings.sent4: The team captain rethought his strategy after losing the first game.
meanings.sent5: The student rethought his study habits after failing the exam.

meanings.definition: To have a new thought about (something)
meanings.sent1: He rethought his opinion on the book after discussing it with his friends.
meanings.sent2: She rethought her career choice after attending a workshop.
meanings.sent3: The cat rethought its decision to chase the squirrel up the tree.
meanings.sent4: The scientist rethought the experiment design to achieve better results.
meanings.sent5: The artist rethought the color palette for the painting to make it more vibrant.
